name: Olan
appearance: Rope-veined hands, river-squint, a pilotâ€™s cloak stitched with sounding marks, a broken oar peg worn on a thong.
character: Wry and fatherly, slow to wrath and quicker to whistle warnings.
talents: whistles that calm moths to quay lamps
flaws: reluctant to adapt to private fleets
dreams: leave charts better than he found them
train a successor from the Floodwalk
secrets: traded route-book pages for a favor during a famine season
knows a submerged stone line shifted and hides how afraid he is
